summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Martha Stewart Wedding Collection - Martha's Wedding Ideas
Review Date: 2012/05/17
Store: Martha Stewart  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles
Product Description: ["Martha showcases some of her wedding favorites to inspire brides as they begin to plan their special day. Discover how to create some of the world's most beautiful floral bouquets and centerpieces. Learn the essentials for finding the perfect bridal gown, and find everything you need to organize a successful wedding reception. From elegant cakes to personalized invitations and thank-you notes, this is an introduction to planning a wedding that every soon-to-be bride should have."]
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Martha Stewart', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '3 hours and 7 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Run time': '3 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 14, 2006', 'Actors': 'Martha Stewart', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Warner Home Video', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I really liked this DVD although I would not have expected any less from Martha Stewart. It showed how easily you could really make your own flowers.
Review Title: Martha Stewart Wedding Collection
Rating: 5.0

Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mark Andrews', 'Brenda Chapman'], 'Producers': ['Katherine Sarafian'], 'Starring': ['Kelly Macdonald', 'Billy Connolly', 'Emma Thompson'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']}
Review Text: This movie is not only entertaining but it also showed something very important. It showed how important it is to listen to our kids and how pride can sometimes hurt our relationships or misguide us into thinking we're always right as parents. My husband and I both truly enjoyed this movie.
Review Title: Great Movie!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wedding Dance
Review Date: 2013/02/09
Store: DanceCrazy.com  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Wedding Dance', '. Wedding Dancing Lessons for everyone. DanceCrazy Presents:', 'The Wedding Dance Deluxe System for Beginners', '. (Note: There is also a', '5 DVD', 'Mastery System on Amazon. You are looking at the 2 DVD Deluxe Version).', 'Learn to dance at your wedding. Waltz, Swing, Rumba, and Foxtrot On Two Comprehensive DVDs. No Experience Necessary! DanceCrazy presents the perfect instructional guide to your first wedding dance, and your first dance as husband and wife. With complete preparation for each dance (Waltz, Foxtrot, Swing, and Rumba), we also include an enormous amount of extra material to cover every aspect of your dance.', 'Every question you have will be answered with our in-depth discussion and overview of key concepts and practices that pertain to dancing at your wedding. We take you step by step through each dance, break everything down for you, dance it with you together to real music, and finally give you additional tips for success! We even put together some great patterns for you to take with you onto the dance floor!', "DanceCrazy's Wedding DVDs are for even the absolute beginner! Never danced before in your life? No coordination? Afraid to dance in front of everyone at your wedding? That's exactly what we're here for. These are the ultimate dance classes, and like taking personal one on one dance lessons.", 'Grab this Wedding Dance DVD Deluxe Set!', 'Review', 'With this video, yes you can. Very easy to follow with instructions that are visually reinforced. Even a guy with two left feet, like me, can learn to be the dance king. I taught my wife a few simple steps and we became the hit of the wedding party as we foxtrotted and waltzed all over the floor. Comments I got were, "Where did you learn to dance like that?" and "I didn\'t know you could dance like that!". One hint, though: Get this video early - don\'t wait until the week before your wedding like I did. You need at least a month of practice for all of the steps to become easy. If you apply yourself just a half hour each night, you can really get the basics down pat. Enjoy. Make Fred and Ginger envious. --Bernd VanderSchuur, Verified PurchaseThis DVD provided several hours of laughter while my daughter and her fiancé, my daughter and I, and my wife and I learned some basic steps and prepared to dance at the daughter\'s wedding last May. Certainly none of us rivaled Fred and Ginger, but just the confidence of knowing _something_ about dance made all the difference in the world. DEFINITELY buy this if you\'ve got an event coming up, and you want to do more that just sway back and forth on the dance floor. --D. Grudzina, Amazon']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Jazz, Music Video & Concerts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'DanceCrazy.com', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Director': 'DanceCrazy.com', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours', 'Release date': 'October 14, 2008', 'Actors': 'DanceCrazy.com', 'Studio': 'CD Baby', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: The couple was very good and taught a lot of dance moves so when it comes to that, you really get your money's worth. I thought they talked a little much but that's just my opinion, some people might like that.
Review Title: Good Instructional CD
Rating: 4.0

Meanwhile, Boyd Crowder (Walton Goggins) finds his grip on Harlan loosening due to a Pentecostal preacher with a penchant for theatrics and a knack for manipulation..."]

Review Title: Great Season

Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul A. Kaufman'], 'Producers': ['Paul A. Kaufman', 'Orly Adelson', 'Christian Bruyère', 'Jean-François Doray', 'Jonathan Eskenas', 'Ronald Gilbert', 'P. Jayakumar', 'Karine Martin', 'Louis-Simon Menard', 'Steven Stabler'], 'Starring': ['Poppy Montgomery', 'Emily Holmes', 'Antonio Cupo', 'Janet Kidder'], 'Studio': ['Lifetime']}
Review Text: I really enjoyed this movie. It's nice to know how Ms. Rowling rose from the bottom to the top. It goes to show you that talent and skill could be hidden anywhere or where you least expect it. It also shows that even if you come from a "good" family that you can still hit rock bottom (well, almost, in her case). I liked how it showed that you can be courageous and also how you need to never give up on your dreams. I know I'm talking about the story/person and not the movie. Regarding the movie itself, I liked the movie a lot. It was an eye-opening to me. I had no idea who JK Rowling was, I only knew how much I loved every single book and how it was hard to let go at the end of the last one.
Review Title: Interesting and Enlightening
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Wedding Dance', '. Wedding Dancing Lessons for everyone. DanceCrazy Presents:', 'The Wedding Dance Deluxe System for Beginners', '. (Note: There is also a', '5 DVD', 'Mastery System on Amazon. You are looking at the 2 DVD Deluxe Version).', 'Learn to dance at your wedding. Waltz, Swing, Rumba, and Foxtrot On Two Comprehensive DVDs. No Experience Necessary! DanceCrazy presents the perfect instructional guide to your first wedding dance, and your first dance as husband and wife. With complete preparation for each dance (Waltz, Foxtrot, Swing, and Rumba), we also include an enormous amount of extra material to cover every aspect of your dance.', 'Every question you have will be answered with our in-depth discussion and overview of key concepts and practices that pertain to dancing at your wedding. We take you step by step through each dance, break everything down for you, dance it with you together to real music, and finally give you additional tips for success! We even put together some great patterns for you to take with you onto the dance floor!', "DanceCrazy's Wedding DVDs are for even the absolute beginner! Never danced before in your life? No coordination? Afraid to dance in front of everyone at your wedding? That's exactly what we're here for. These are the ultimate dance classes, and like taking personal one on one dance lessons.", 'Grab this Wedding Dance DVD Deluxe Set!', 'Review', 'With this video, yes you can. Very easy to follow with instructions that are visually reinforced. Even a guy with two left feet, like me, can learn to be the dance king. I taught my wife a few simple steps and we became the hit of the wedding party as we foxtrotted and waltzed all over the floor. Comments I got were, "Where did you learn to dance like that?" and "I didn\'t know you could dance like that!". One hint, though: Get this video early - don\'t wait until the week before your wedding like I did. You need at least a month of practice for all of the steps to become easy. If you apply yourself just a half hour each night, you can really get the basics down pat. Enjoy. Make Fred and Ginger envious. --Bernd VanderSchuur, Verified PurchaseThis DVD provided several hours of laughter while my daughter and her fiancé, my daughter and I, and my wife and I learned some basic steps and prepared to dance at the daughter\'s wedding last May. Certainly none of us rivaled Fred and Ginger, but just the confidence of knowing _something_ about dance made all the difference in the world. DEFINITELY buy this if you\'ve got an event coming up, and you want to do more that just sway back and forth on the dance floor. --D. Grudzina, Amazon']

Review Text: I really enjoyed this movie. It's nice to know how Ms. Rowling rose from the bottom to the top. It goes to show you that talent and skill could be hidden anywhere or where you least expect it. It also shows that even if you come from a "good" family that you can still hit rock bottom (well, almost, in her case). I liked how it showed that you can be courageous and also how you need to never give up on your dreams. I know I'm talking about the story/person and not the movie. Regarding the movie itself, I liked the movie a lot. It was an eye-opening to me. I had no idea who JK Rowling was, I only knew how much I loved every single book and how it was hard to let go at the end of the last one.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has consistently reported positive experiences with various movies and instructional DVDs. They expressed enjoyment of wedding planning content, finding it inspirational and easy to follow. Overall, the action-packed and family-friendly movies were well-received, frequently highlighting their entertainment value and the ability to bond with loved ones. Educational content, particularly regarding dance and life lessons, was appreciated for its clear instructions and engaging narratives. The user particularly enjoys series like "Grimm" and "Downton Abbey," showing excitement for new seasons and depth in character development, indicating a strong preference for quality storytelling.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Some negative experiences were noted, with the user expressing dissatisfaction towards certain films. They described a particular entry as forgettable, failing to make a lasting impression alongside an overall mediocre viewing experience. Additionally, they mentioned that some instructional content felt overly verbose, suggesting a preference for more concise presentations. A few family movies didn't meet expectations, rated lower due to the perceived lack of compelling content or engagement.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchase history reveals a predominantly positive engagement with movies and instructional DVDs, focusing on entertainment, family bonding, and creativity, especially related to weddings. However, occasional disappointments with specific films arise, indicating a discerning taste in movie selection. They appreciate insightful narratives and helpful instructional guides but desire brevity in explanations for educational materials. Overall, this patterns reflect a well-rounded appreciation for quality entertainment with some areas of critique regarding specific viewing experiences.
